answers.answer: Hello,Common causes causing erection problem are stress and anxiety, unrealistic sexual expectations,negative feelings about non performance,smoking, alcohol and sometimes illicit drugs and medical conditions like diabetes, high blood pressure, heart or thyroid conditions, poor circulation, low testosterone, depression, spinal cord injury, nerve damage (for example, from prostate surgery), or neurologic disorders (such as multiple sclerosis or Parkinson's disease).Eat nutritious healthy food,exercise regularly and cut down on smoking or alcohol if you are taking it.If still a problem then pls get yourself evaluated for the medical conditions mentioned above.Hope it helps.Warm regards.

question: I am able to achieve a spontaneous erection,infact..it takes hardly 10- 15 secs to acheive a full erection.But I am unable to achieve a climax (orgasm and ejaculation).Never smoked, or had alchohol or any Drugs ..or anything like that.Still virgin. Dont suffer from any health disorder also..please suggest..what to do...This discussion is related to/posts/show/912386.
title: absolutly same problem with me also
